caption: A man was carrying a television and walking in a room. A woman and a boy were nearby. The man placed the television on a cabinet, causing it to collapse, and the television fell. The boy was writing at the dining table. The man was pacing back and forth. Later, the man also started writing at the table. A family was eating at the dining table. Outdoors, a group of children were lining up under the guidance of a teacher. Suddenly, a boy fell to the ground. In a room, a group of doctors were conducting medical examinations for children and showing them a few drawings.
